scripts.build: npm run build -w @json-feed-types/common && npm run build -w @json-feed-types/1_1
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump patch version' && git tag v$(node -p "require('./packages/common/package.json').version")
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump minor version' && git tag v$(node -p "require('./packages/common/package.json').version")
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump major version' && git tag v$(node -p "require('./packages/common/package.json').version")
